bill.summary:
Protecting Taxpayers Act
This bill modifies the organizational structure, management practices, and enforcement procedures of the Internal Revenue Service (IRS).
The bill modifies policies regarding:
the IRS Oversight Board, employee training procedures, tax enforcement procedures, various tax requirements that affect small businesses, the correction of errors by retirement plan administrators, programs that assist low-income taxpayers, the IRS appeals process for taxpayers, and information technology.
